name: Orange Blaster
description:
Controller support for player.

In the input settings shoot is "Fire1", dodge is "Fire2", and run is "Fire3"

Can you make it through all 8 levels?
If you die you will be taken back to level 1.

Collect oranges to squeeze into OJ to power up.
OJ is kept after death, but not if you close the game.

Go to the tube just left of the start to power up.

Font used was Nakki

font was created by “Neoqueto”.
This font has a homepage where this archive and other versions may be found:
http://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/413238
